GRID.name: Registrations
GRID.where: (existing_id is null AND is_rejected=false AND is_deferred=false)

FORM.name: Students
FORM.GRIDBOX:
sponsor_id
sponsor_id sponsor_type_name sponsor_name town sys_country_name details

FORM.name: Evaluation
FORM.COMBOLIST: honesty Always Honest Mostly Honest Dishonest
reliabilty Consistently Dependable Needs some supervision Unreliable
coperation Very Co-operative Cooperative Not very Co-operative
punctuality Always Punctual Mostly Punctual Often Late
church_activities Very Active Often Participates Seldom Participates
overal Outstanding Exemplary Average Below Average

GRID.name: Student Full Charge
GRID.where: ( fees is not null OR fees!='0')

FORM.name: Course
FORM.COMBOLIST: class_option Main Group A Group B Group C Group D Group E Group F

ACTIONS.name: Sessions
ACTIONS.ACTION: Change NG to F or UE

FORM.name: Fields
FORM.COMBOLIST: field_type TEXTFIELD TEXTAREA TITLE TEXT SUBGRID DATE TIME LIST SELECT TAB

FORM.name: Residence Allocation
FORM.GRIDBOX:
sresidence_id
Residence_id residence_name session_id residence_option charges
